My favorite color is green.
I'm fond of cats.
My favorite artist is Pablo Picasso.

GOD#Comma my shepherd! I don't need a thing.#NewlineYou have bedded me down in lush meadows#Comma you find me quiet pools to drink from.#NewlineTrue to your word#Comma you let me catch my breath and send me in the right direction.#NewlineEven when the way goes through Death Valley#Comma I'm not afraid when you walk at my side. Your trusty shepherd's crook makes me feel secure.
My favorite food is electricity.  Can you charge the battery?
